How to prevent Kyasanur Forest Disease (KFD) ?,A vaccine does exist for KFD and is used in endemic areas of India. Additional preventative measures include insect repellents and wearing protective clothing in areas where ticks are endemic.,CDC,Kyasanur Forest Disease (KFD)
